item.description:
Please notice date change!


We now have an excellent meeting location with plenty of room for seperate dicussions or to run your robot around the floor.

This meeting will now be held at the Microsoft NERD
in Cambridge. NERD is at One Memorial Drive (around the corner from the MIT/Kendal
stop on the Red line). Street parking is free after 6PM.

You may wish to check out the Boston Arduino Group for other details.

The folks at NERD have given us confirmed meeting dates for the next
six months (THANKS!). Unfortunately the next meetup which was schenduled
for April 15th needed to be changed to April 22nd.

The meeting dates for the next six months are Apr 22, May 13, Jun 17,
Jul 15, Aug 19 and Sep 23. All of these are Thursday nights from 6PM-9PM.
The meeting details are on the Meetup calendar.
item.name: Joint Meeting with Arduino Group
